sentences.sContent: But where were the Scots from?
sentences.sCn: 但是，苏格兰人又是从哪里来的？

sentences.sContent: But I was still Queen of Scots,so I came back to Scotland.
sentences.sContent_eng: But I was still Queen of Scots,so I came back to Scotland.
sentences.sCn: 但是我仍然是苏格兰的女王，因此，我回到了苏格兰。

sentences.sContent: It is the story of my lady Mary,Queen of Scots.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is the story of my lady Mary,Queen of Scots.
sentences.sCn: 它是有关我的夫人玛丽苏格兰女王的故事。

trans.tranCn: 苏格兰的；苏格兰人的；苏格兰英语的

trans.tranOther: any of the English dialects spoken or written in Scotland
